Using the large [[Mechanical Drilling Arm|mechanical drill]] on his right arm. Toki fires it in the direction he desires with such force that it can literally change the geography of the affected area. He used this technique to create a fork in the river which he used as a [[Wikipedia:Choke point|choke point]] where he can attack his targets.
